Description: The task involves predicting multiple continuous values for given medical case descriptions. Each value corresponds to a clinically relevant metric or measurement derived from different entities or conditions identified in the input text.

measurement_1.description: Predicted numerical value for the first entity or condition.

measurement_2.description: Predicted numerical value for the second entity or condition, if applicable.

measurement_3.description: Predicted numerical value for the third entity or condition, if applicable.

measurement_4.description: Predicted numerical value for the fourth entity or condition, if applicable.

measurement_5.description: Predicted numerical value for the fifth entity or condition, if applicable.
